name: Mystery Desert
description:
You land upon a remote desert where multiple ancient artifacts are detected but something seems odd. The truth crystals hold the answer to the mystery.

NOTE:

This was my first entry in any game jam so the game is quite INCOMPLETE. No sounds and a bit buggy and pretty short gameplay. Nevertheless im just glad i could finally put something out there. There huge room for improvement which i plan to work on in the future. Thanks to anyone who tries it out and feedback!
